com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.crx

Class CRXSignatureHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.crx.CRXSignatureHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SignatureHelper

    @Component(role=SignatureHelper.class,
           hint="crx")
public class CRXSignatureHelper
extends Object
implements SignatureHelper
    Implementation of SignatureHelper that signs a byte array using a public/private key pair.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

        public byte[] sign(byte[] data,
                   PrivateKey key)
            throws GeneralSecurityException
        Generate the signature for a byte array using the private key.
        Specified by:
        sign in interface SignatureHelper
        Parameters:
        data - The byte array.

        Returns:

      • check

        public boolean check(byte[] data,
                     PublicKey key,
                     byte[] signature)
              throws GeneralSecurityException
        Check that the signature is valid using the public key.
        Specified by:
        check in interface SignatureHelper
        Parameters:
        data - The data for which the signature was generated.
        key - The public key.
        signature - The signature.
        Returns:
        true if the signature was valid. Otherwise, false.
        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException - If there was an error validating the signature.
